Hi does anybody know how i can get the size of URIs?
When  you look into the crawl.log of a job you see
lines like this:
Timestamp          status-code  size(?!?!)  ... 
20050115140549625   404         204         

I tried to read it out via the getContentSize()-Method
of the CrawlURI class but this doesn'T seem to work as
it should... Maybe i can get it via the HttpRecorder???
